title: Capellus virbius, sive redivivus: or, A monument erected in severall elegies to the memory of the right honourable and noble Arthur Lord Capell, Baron of Hadham And his excellent lady, the Lady Elizabeth Capell dowager.
author: Philipot, Thomas, d. 1682.
publisher: printed by Roger Vaughan, dwelling in St. Martins le Grand,
notes: Signed at end of dedication: Thomas Philipot.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
